testcase.name: Reusable steps to create incident from MLF and bridge with any external vendor
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the ITIL view.............................................passed When user impersonate the user "poddepa"....................................passed And verify the user profile.................................................passed And Open new ticket in ServiceNow at MLF....................................passed And Fill description and short description along with all mandatory field...passed And verify if source field does not have value "Integration from AVAYA" and take screenshot "STRY0020671_Inc_ITIL".passed And fetch all the contains field of source field............................passed Then Assign ticket to activated ServiceNow interface which is "AVAYA_Integ-ServiceDesk-IPCR".passed And Refresh the page........................................................passed When MLF incident gets bridge with CSC......................................passed Then take the CSC incident ticket number and take screenshot "STRY0020671_Inc_ITIL".passed And Clicks on the resolve button after filling category and subcategory as "1".passed
